message: For the Xoom owners that haven't figured this out yet, Linux (probably) isn't going to automount your device because it uses MTP rather than USB storage.

This will help you get music to and from the device, but I have no working solution yet for video. mtpfs has not worked for me, unfortunately. 

https://help.ubuntu.com/10.04/musicvideophotos/C/music-portable.html
